oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oath of Enlistment for Tennessee State Guard during World War II
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One sheet of typed paper containing the oath of enlistment for members of the Tennessee State Guard during World War II. Also contained on the blank form are the enlistment record and declaration of the applicant.
These forms are of particular importance given the absence of military records for Tennessee State Guard enlisted men.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1947
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Militia; Tennessee - History, Military; World War, 1939-1945
Militias
